summary: Harmonic will leave your beautiful graphic.
descriptionHtml:
[center][u]Sorry my English is terrible.[/u]

[size=4][size=5]Now versions available: 2.3[/size]

[size=2][b]NO FPS DROP !!![/b]
Runs well in 1920x1080 resolution and quality Ultra the next PC :
Core2Duo 3Ghz | 8GB RAM | GTX550Ti[/size][/size][/center]

[color=#7FFF00][color=#7FFF00]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color][/color]
[b]Installation:[/b]
Copy the files to the root folder where the game was installed.

Navigate to .../Documents/My Games/Skyrim
Set these values in SkyrimPrefs.ini:

[Imagespace]
bDoDepthOfField=1

[color=#3c78d8][color=#7FFF00]-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color][/color]
Â [b]I use and highly recommend the following MODs for an experience and enhanced graphics.[/b][b]
[/b]
[u]Mods:[/u]
Climates Of Tamriel 3.1 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]CLICK HERE[/url][color=#ffe599] (Recommended)
[/color]Climates Of Tamriel Weather Patch 16 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39799/?]CLICK HERE [/url][color=#ffe599](Recommended)[/color]
Remove Interior Fog V2 1.3 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29253/?]CLICK HERE
[/url]Pure Waters 5 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1111/?]CLICK HERE
[/url]Realistic Sun for Climates of Tamriel and Vanilla 3.0 [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42492/?]CLICK HERE[/url][color=#ffe599] (Recommended)[/color]

author: taran
